channel.title: Lag Patch?
channel.description:
Is there such thing as a LAG Patch? Like something to reduce the lag on a server source because a lot of these sources i play have a giant lag and if i host it online i don't want to lag that bad so if someone could tell me if a lag patch is real or not that would be great and if it is real how would i insert it in my server thank you :]
~~RAR[color=limegreen]E[color=black]S[/color][/color]

item.title: Lag Patch?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The reason they lag is because they are horribly programed, look into some of the scratch servers and you will see a big difference between them.

Read full topic

item.title: Lag Patch?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:1, topic:353362”]Is there such thing as a LAG Patch? Like something to reduce the lag on a server source because a lot of these sources i play have a giant lag and if i host it online i don’t want to lag that bad so if someone could tell me if a lag patch is real or not that would be great and if it is real how would i insert it in my server thank you :]

~~RAR[color=limegreen]E[color=black]S[/color][/color][/quote]

There is in fact a way to not have lag.

DON’T USE SHIT SERVERS AND DON’T PROGRAM SHIT SERVERS

Read full topic
